Package il.org.spartan.utils

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.org.spartan.utils.Rectangle
  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents a Rectangle and was constructed with the TDD method.
    A Rectangle is constructed with two Points which represent two vertices in the Rectangle: top-left, and bottom-right.
    The class's methods retrieves Area, Perimeter, Length and Width, all calculated from the given Points.
    Since:
    November 2018
    Author:
    Idan Hadad

          throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        constructor
        Parameters:
        a - : a Point which represent either top-left or bottom-right vertex.

        Throws:
